weapons.description: The M4/M4A1 5.56mm Carbine is a lightweight, gas-operated, air-cooled, magazine-fed, selective-rate, shoulder-fired weapon with a collapsible stock
weapons.name: M4 carbine

weapons.description: The AK-47, officially known as the Avtomat Kalashnikova  is a gas-operated assault rifle chambered for the 7.62×39mm cartridge
weapons.name: AK-47

weapons.description: The Benelli M4 is a semi-automatic shotgun produced by Italian firearm manufacturer Benelli Armi SpA
weapons.name: Benelli M4 Super 90

weapons.description: The Browning Automatic 5, most often Auto-5 or simply A-5, is a recoil-operated semi-automatic shotgun designed by John Browning and manufactured by Fabrique Nationale de Herstal.
weapons.name: Semi-automatic shotgun

weapons.description: The Beretta 90-Two is a series of semi-automatic pistols designed and manufactured by Beretta of Italy
weapons.name: Beretta 90-Two

weapons.description: The CZ 100 is a semi-automatic handgun, introduced in 1995 by Česká Zbrojovka
weapons.name: CZ 100

weapons.description: The GSh-18 (Cyrillic: ГШ-18) is a 9mm semi-automatic pistol developed by the KBP Instrument Design Bureau in Tula during the 1990s
weapons.name: GSh-18

weapons.description: The Adaptive Combat Rifle (ACR) is a modular assault rifle formerly designed by Magpul Industries of Austin, Texas, and known initially as the Masada
weapons.name: Adaptive Combat Rifle
